name: Golden Fish
description:
Game Story:

Read this quickly. The cameras are watching.

Haven't you wondered why you're there? Why don't you remember anything outside of that office? I've started to think that something might not be right, but I don't remember what happens there after I leave.

Use your time there wisely. Try to find out as much information as you can. Bring the goldfish with you. It'll help you to remember. I trust that you get to the bottom of this.

You wrote this, after all.

Gameplay:

E->Grab item / Interact
